data.text: @lautowns Thank you. I pray for all the Long Covid/MECFS/H1N1 sufferers. I am distressed at seeing all of you go through what I have gone through for over 30 years. Post viral illnesses are not new & largely ignored. Little has changed in the last 3 decades, sadly.
@NoahTzedek There is no alt text for this image, I'm sorry.

@lautowns and thank you for your allyship

yes, it’s felt like helplessly watching a horror movie slowly unfold

we’re so sorry you’ve had to join us here
♥️
@lautowns Thank you. I’m so sorry we weren’t able to win this fight before y’all got sick. All we can do now is keep fighting. Onward!

@lautowns Thank you for acknowledging us. It's been utterly horrifying to watch so many people struck with long covid. I feel so much empathy for you all. (I have several autoimmune conditions that emerged after a serious respiratory infection.)

@lautowns 🙏 23 years post virus I never recovered from. It triggered neuro #MyalgicEncephalomyelitis I can’t stand for long without HR rocketing & have a debilitating energy impairment that means it takes days/weeks to recover from activity as my mitochondria no longer recharges normally
@lautowns Thank you so much on behalf of everyone with #LongCovid #ResearchLongCovid ♥️
